sections.text:
79-3204.Seizure disorder materials; review by school employees; when required.

Beginning with school year 2022-23, in addition to any other professional development and collegial planning activities for certificated school employees, each certificated school employee shall participate in a minimum of one hour of self-study review of seizure disorder materials at least once in every two school years.

SourceLaws 2021, LB639, ยง 4.
